name: Future Advocacy
goal: We are a consultancy and think tank focused on tackling the greatest challenges of the 21st Century.  Areas of work include nutrition, health, and the social impact of artificial intelligence.
interests: Budget, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, External Relations, Food Safety, Humanitarian Aid, Public Health, Regional Policy
euInitiatives:
EU efforts to tackle HIV AIDS
EU efforts to maximise the opportunities and minimise the risks of artificial intelligence
EU efforts to promote good nutrition and tackle childhood obesity
